content: **knitted hat for men in drops merino extra fine piece is knitted bottom up in rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #fogwhisperhat drops design pattern me-300 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head circumference approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/61 cm **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-150 g colour 54 morning fog **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
